item.title: What is TFT LCD?
item.description:
TFT LCD (Thin-Film Transistor Liquid Crystal Display) is a sophisticated display technology used extensively across modern electronics. From smartphones and tablets to factory HMIs and medical monitors, TFT LCDs form the visual interface of countless devices. This article presents an in-depth look at TFT LCD technologyâ€”its working principle, structure, advantages, variants, and applications.

Introduction to TFT LCD Technology

TFT LCDs belong to the family of active-matrix displays. Each pixel is coupled with a thin-film transistor, enabling independent and accurate control of image rendering. This technology surpasses passive matrix displays in speed, contrast, and overall quality.
